amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Strand Theater Arts Center in Plattsburgh, New York, to convert the Strand Theater into a performing arts center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill by the Strand Theater Arts Center in Plattsburgh, New York, to convert the Strand Theater into a performing arts center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 366 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 366 (Roll no. 280).
